title: Words Worth
synopsis: The legend has survived for generation. The Words Worth tablet, which will unlock the secrets of the Universe for the one who can decipher it, has been shattered. The warring tribes of Light and Shadow blame each other, and their accusations lead to all out war!
voices: ['Suzumura, Kenichi', 'Motoi, Emi', 'Furumoto, Shinya', 'Koorogi, Satomi', 'Chiyo', 'Kida, Utako', 'Takano, Naoko']
staff: [['Kageyama, Shigenori', ['Script', ' Storyboard', ' Screenplay']], ['ELF Corporation', ['Original Creator']], ['Rinshin', ['Key Animation', ' Animation Director', ' Character Design']], ['Ooshiro, Tsutomu', ['Key Animation']]]
